annotation.spannedText: You definitely should

classMention.mentionClass: You definitely should

annotation.spannedText: Start by talking to your doctor

classMention.mentionClass: Start by talking to your doctor

annotation.spannedText: check out this guide to the vaccines you and your family should get before and during your pregnancy — plus those you should wait to get until after you've delivered

classMention.mentionClass: check out this guide to the vaccines you and your family should get before and during your pregnancy — plus those you should wait to get until after you've delivered

annotation.spannedText: Before you become pregnant, get checked by your doctor to see if you need the varicella vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: Before you become pregnant, get checked by your doctor to see if you need the varicella vaccine

annotation.spannedText: women who are already pregnant should not receive the vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: women who are already pregnant should not receive the vaccine

annotation.spannedText: if you weren’t immunized according to the childhood schedule, you should get vaccinated and then wait one month before trying to conceive

classMention.mentionClass: if you weren’t immunized according to the childhood schedule, you should get vaccinated and then wait one month before trying to conceive

annotation.spannedText: Get the shots now, before you conceive — even if you were vaccinated, it’s perfectly safe to get an additional dose

classMention.mentionClass: Get the shots now, before you conceive — even if you were vaccinated, it’s perfectly safe to get an additional dose

annotation.spannedText: If you’re at high risk for this viral infection that attacks the liver (say, you’re a health-care worker and you come into contact with people’s blood and bodily fluids, which is how hepatitis B is transmitted, or if you’ve had more than one sex partner in the past six months), then you’d be wise to make sure you’re up-to-date on this vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re at high risk for this viral infection that attacks the liver (say, you’re a health-care worker and you come into contact with people’s blood and bodily fluids, which is how hepatitis B is transmitted, or if you’ve had more than one sex partner in the past six months), then you’d be wise to make sure you’re up-to-date on this vaccine

annotation.spannedText: It’s safe to continue with the series during pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: It’s safe to continue with the series during pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: You should still get a new shot this (and every) year— because immunity wanes with time, and the flu shot is reformulated every year to incorporate whichever strains doctors think will be most prevalent

classMention.mentionClass: You should still get a new shot this (and every) year— because immunity wanes with time, and the flu shot is reformulated every year to incorporate whichever strains doctors think will be most prevalent

annotation.spannedText: be sure to get vaccinated if you're planning to get pregnant or are caring for a small child, and make sure your little one gets vaccinated, too

classMention.mentionClass: be sure to get vaccinated if you're planning to get pregnant or are caring for a small child, and make sure your little one gets vaccinated, too

annotation.spannedText: All women should get this shot between 27 to 36 weeks of each pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: All women should get this shot between 27 to 36 weeks of each pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: if you're at risk for whooping cough due to an outbreak in your community or if you get a deep cut in your skin and are due for your tetanus booster, the vaccine is also safe to get earlier in pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: if you're at risk for whooping cough due to an outbreak in your community or if you get a deep cut in your skin and are due for your tetanus booster, the vaccine is also safe to get earlier in pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: that’s important, since whooping cough is highly contagious and can be deadly for young babies, whose immune systems are still developing

classMention.mentionClass: that’s important, since whooping cough is highly contagious and can be deadly for young babies, whose immune systems are still developing

annotation.spannedText: If you’re at high risk of hepatitis B (a health-care worker, dialysis patient, have had sex with more than one partner in the last six months or are traveling to a country where hep B is prevalent, including many countries in Africa, the Middle East, Asia and Western Europe), you should get vaccinated during pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re at high risk of hepatitis B (a health-care worker, dialysis patient, have had sex with more than one partner in the last six months or are traveling to a country where hep B is prevalent, including many countries in Africa, the Middle East, Asia and Western Europe), you should get vaccinated during pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: There are several vaccines you definitely shouldn’t get during pregnancy

classMention.mentionClass: There are several vaccines you definitely shouldn’t get during pregnancy

annotation.spannedText: If you’re not immunized against the chickenpox virus, you should get this vaccine before you conceive

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re not immunized against the chickenpox virus, you should get this vaccine before you conceive

annotation.spannedText: Talk to your doctor before you become pregnant if you never had chickenpox as a child or were never vaccinated as a child

classMention.mentionClass: Talk to your doctor before you become pregnant if you never had chickenpox as a child or were never vaccinated as a child

annotation.spannedText: If you’re exposed to the varicella virus while you’re pregnant (your nephew’s preschool class has an outbreak, say) and haven’t received the vaccine, talk to the doctor about getting the varicella-zoster immune globulin, which can offer you temporary immunity and prevent complications should you come down with a case of the pox

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re exposed to the varicella virus while you’re pregnant (your nephew’s preschool class has an outbreak, say) and haven’t received the vaccine, talk to the doctor about getting the varicella-zoster immune globulin, which can offer you temporary immunity and prevent complications should you come down with a case of the pox

annotation.spannedText: If you’re 26 or younger, you should, however, get the vaccine after your baby is born

classMention.mentionClass: If you’re 26 or younger, you should, however, get the vaccine after your baby is born

annotation.spannedText: you should not receive the following vaccines, since not enough studies have been done on pregnant women to determine whether they're safe for baby

classMention.mentionClass: you should not receive the following vaccines, since not enough studies have been done on pregnant women to determine whether they're safe for baby

annotation.spannedText: The CDC

classMention.mentionClass: The CDC

annotation.spannedText: Do keep in mind, however, that these vaccines are safe if you’re breastfeeding — and, if you get these shots postpartum, you’ll pass some temporary immunity on to your baby through your breast milk

classMention.mentionClass: Do keep in mind, however, that these vaccines are safe if you’re breastfeeding — and, if you get these shots postpartum, you’ll pass some temporary immunity on to your baby through your breast milk

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who takes care of or spends a lot of time with your baby — including grandparents, siblings, caregivers, babysitters, day-care providers — should be up-to-date on their shots

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who takes care of or spends a lot of time with your baby — including grandparents, siblings, caregivers, babysitters, day-care providers — should be up-to-date on their shots

annotation.spannedText: Make sure your partner and other relatives (and your sitter if you have one) schedule a flu vaccine, since the virus is so prevalent and the formulation changes every year

classMention.mentionClass: Make sure your partner and other relatives (and your sitter if you have one) schedule a flu vaccine, since the virus is so prevalent and the formulation changes every year

annotation.spannedText: make sure they are up-to-date on their Tdap and Dtap vaccines, since pertussis is highly contagious, and statistics show that most babies get whooping cough from a family member.

classMention.mentionClass: make sure they are up-to-date on their Tdap and Dtap vaccines, since pertussis is highly contagious, and statistics show that most babies get whooping cough from a family member.
